title: Is Lewis Capaldi singing the John Lewis Christmas advert song?
text:
Could Lewis Capaldi be about to take on John Lewis? (Picture: Getty Images)

Christmas is just a couple of months away and that means that it’s only a matter of time before the John Lewis Christmas ad makes its way on to our screens.

It wouldn’t be the festive season of course without the retail giants tugging at our heartstrings – or making us laugh – in their bid for festive good cheer, and while we wait patiently speculation is of course rife as to who’ll be singing the ad’s song this year.

Last year it was a Sir Elton John classic, but this year the bookies have their eyes on someone very different indeed, with Lewis Capaldi tipped for the job.

Could the Someone You Loved singer be in line for a brush with John Lewis?

Here’s what you need to know…

Is Lewis Capaldi singing the John Lewis Christmas advert song?

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s not yet been confirmed who will be singing the song that accompanies this year’s John Lewis Christmas ad.

However the bookies have installed Lewis Capaldi as the favourite for the job.

The Scottish singer is currently just 2/5 to grace the ad with his vocals, according to Betway – who have him way ahead of second favourite Ed Sheeran in the betting.

‘The release of the John Lewis Christmas advert marks the start of the festive season and each year the retailer aims to win over the hearts of the nation,’ said Betway’s Alan Alger,

‘It’ll be difficult to top last year’s The Boy and the Piano which featured the legendary Elton John. Although Lewis Capaldi and Ed Sheeran are front runners, originality in advertising is key and we might see a Christmas surprise from the retailer!’

Capaldi’s fans seem to be sold on the idea too.

If Lewis were to do the ad, it would be the latest success for the singer, who’s been celebrating this week after reaching number one in the US.

Who else is tipped for the John Lewis Christmas ad?

Ed Sheeran has also been tipped as a possibility (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

The current odds look a little like this:

Lewis Capaldi 2/5

Ed Sheeran 9/4

Sam Smith 4/1

Lily Allen 7/1

Elbow 8/1

Tom Odell 10/1

Jorja Smith 16/1

Advertisement

Advertisement

When is the John Lewis Christmas advert released?

That’s yet to be confirmed – with the retailer always keeping the details a closely guarded secret.

However in recent years the ad has made its debut on screens in early-to-mid November – with last year’s effort, The Boy And The Piano, not being released until 15 November.

So we’ll just have to hang in there a little bit longer…

description: With the John Lewis Christmas ad arriving soon, Lewis Capaldi is the favourite to sing the song from this year's campaign.
